item.title: 美国养老金准备在大涨之后囤积公司债券
item.description: 分析师和顾问说，美国公司养老金准备将数十亿美元转入企业信贷，此前几个月的股市上涨和债券收益率提高已使他们现金充裕。【原文：US company pensions are poised to shift billions of dollars into corporate credit, after months of stock-market gains and higher bond yields have left them awash with cash, analysts and advisers said.】

item.title: 安哥拉将出售从大亨手中没收的标准银行股份
item.description: 根据一项总统令，安哥拉计划出售安哥拉标准银行（Standard Bank de Angola SA）的少数股份。【原文：Angola plans to sell a minority stake in Standard Bank de Angola SA that was controlled by a former insurance tycoon who is serving a nine-year prison term, according to a presidential decree.】

item.title: 波兰决策者对央行行长 2026 年的赌注表示怀疑
item.description: 几位波兰央行行长表示，随着通胀的消退，他们可能会在明年开始权衡降息事宜，而行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）出人意料地将宽松预期延长至2026年的提议则被搁置一旁。【原文：Several Polish central bankers said they could begin weighing an interest-rate cut next year as inflation subsides, brushing aside Governor Adam Glapinski’s unexpected bid to stretch easing expectations into 2026.】

item.title: 肯尼亚斯坦比克公司（Stanbic Kenya）看到十倍资本规则将行业减半
item.description: 据 Stanbic Holdings Plc 公司称，肯尼亚计划将银行的最低核心资本提高十倍，这可能会使东非国家的贷款机构数量减少一半，因为其中一些企业会合并业务。【原文：Kenya’s plan to increase the minimum core capital for banks ten-fold could half the number of lenders in the East African nation, as some of these businesses merge their operations, according to Stanbic Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 科三润滑油部门 Moove 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 巴西企业集团 Cosan SA 旗下的 Moove 润滑油控股公司已秘密申请首次公开募股。【原文：Moove Lubricants Holdings, a unit of Brazil conglomerate Cosan SA, has filed confidentially for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 斯普罗特称新铜基金规模太小，不会带来市场风险
item.description: 斯普罗特公司（Sprott Inc.）表示，其购买和持有实物铜的新基金规模太小，不会对这种工业金属的全球供应量产生影响，尽管大约十年前该公司曾试图推出类似产品，但引起了争议。【原文：Sprott Inc. says its new fund to buy and hold physical copper will be too small to have an impact on global availability of the industrial metal, despite past controversy over attempts to launch similar products about a decade ago.】

item.title: Pimco 警告称信贷市场回报无法弥补风险
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Investors are being insufficiently compensated for the risks of lending in the credit market as more capital chasing too few opportunities curbs returns, according to Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 飓风风险促使一家加勒比银行为其财务做好防灾准备
item.description: 上周，飓风贝里尔横扫加勒比海，使小岛屿国家政府急于为数十亿美元的损失寻找资金。【原文：Hurricane Beryl ripped through the Caribbean last week, leaving small island governments rushing to find funds for the billions of dollars in damages.】

item.title: 中国监管机构将收紧股票交易规则以加强监管
item.description: 中国证监会正在收紧对卖空、高频交易和证券借贷的规定，以打击不当套利行为，维护市场稳定。【原文：The China Securities Regulatory Commission is tightening rules on short selling, high-frequency trades and securities-lending in a bid to crack down on improper arbitrage and maintain market stability.】

item.title: 新西兰住宅建筑成本十多年来首次下降
item.description: 新西兰房屋建筑成本在至少 12 年来首次出现下降，主要原因是供应链中断情况有所缓解，材料成本下降，以及利率上升导致需求减弱。【原文：New Zealand house-building costs fell for the first time in at least 12 years, led by a drop in material costs as supply chain disruptions ease as well as weaker demand due to elevated interest rates.】

item.title: 美国天然气牛市终于迎来好消息
item.description:
预测人士称，下半年燃料价格将上涨三分之一以上。【原文：

Forecasters say prices for the fuel are set to rise by over a third in the second half of the year.

】

item.title: 欧佩克数据显示石油减产落后者仍超出供应极限
item.description: 欧佩克+"主要国家伊拉克、哈萨克斯坦和俄罗斯的产量继续高于旨在支撑全球油价的产量限额，该集团的数据显示了这一点。【原文：Key OPEC+ nations Iraq, Kazakhstan and Russia continue to pump above output limits intended to shore up global oil prices, the group’s data showed.】

item.title: 罗恩-奥泽尔的对冲基金 Statar 跌幅达两位数后出现亏损
item.description: 罗恩-奥泽尔（Ron Ozer）是一位天然气交易专家，因在波动剧烈的市场上大举下注而闻名，在第二季度出现两位数的跌幅后，他减少了损失。【原文：Ron Ozer, a natural gas trading specialist known for outsize bets on the volatile market, has pared his losses following double-digit declines in the second quarter.】

item.title: 亚历克斯福布斯称养老金改革促进南非退休人员增长
item.description: 亚历山大-福布斯集团控股有限公司（Alexander Forbes Group Holdings Ltd.）表示，南非允许储蓄者提前动用部分养老基金的计划将使退休人员获得比现行制度更好的待遇。【原文：South Africa’s plan to allow savers early access to part of their pension funds will enable significantly better outcomes for retirees than what the current system does, Alexander Forbes Group Holdings Ltd. said.】

item.title: 奥运在即，游客纷纷避开巴黎最昂贵的酒店
item.description: 事实证明，在今年夏天的奥运会之前，巴黎出人意料地不受富裕游客的青睐，游客们担心开车在巴黎穿行会有困难。【原文：Paris is proving to be a surprisingly unpopular destination for wealthy tourists ahead of the Olympics this summer, with visitors concerned about difficulties in navigating the city by car.】

item.title: 官员称欧洲考虑在 2027 年末跟随美国 T+1 行动
item.description: 欧洲金融市场似乎将效仿美国，转而采用一天结算周期，官方正考虑在 2027 年的最后几个月采取这一举措。【原文：European financial markets look set to follow the US example of switching to a one-day settlement cycle, with officials considering a move in the final months of 2027.】

item.title: 宝马在电动汽车竞赛中甩开奔驰和奥迪
item.description: 在梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）和奥迪（Audi）陷入困境之际，宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）第二季度业绩大幅增长，在向电动汽车转型的过程中扩大了对德国竞争对手的领先优势。【原文：BMW AG extended its lead over German rivals in the shift to electric vehicles with a jump in the second quarter as Mercedes-Benz and Audi struggled.】

item.title: 贝莱德依靠戏谑的前交易员推动债券业务发展
item.description: 2013 年，帕特-哈斯凯尔（Pat Haskell）接管摩根士丹利市政债券部不久，他就分发了印有 "EFD "字母的橡胶手环。他希望他的团队每天都能全力以赴。【原文：Not long after Pat Haskell took over Morgan Stanley’s municipal-bond department in 2013, he handed out rubber bracelets with the letters “EFD.” He wanted his team to bring their best every f---ing day.】

item.title: 联合国称 IRH 矿业交易商曾与刚果黄金走私者会面
item.description: 据联合国的一份报告称，阿布扎比最大的上市公司一直在推动采矿业的发展，该公司的一名商人因与来自非洲中部的黄金走私者有交易而被起诉。【原文：A businessman who has been leading a push into mining by Abu Dhabi’s largest listed company has been cited for having dealings with smugglers of gold from central Africa, according to a United Nations report.】

item.title: 马来西亚反对党重新补选面临障碍
item.description: 马来西亚反对党试图再举行六次补选的努力遭遇绊脚石，确保了总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）的联合政府的稳定。【原文：A Malaysian opposition party’s attempt to force six more by-elections has hit a stumbling block, ensuring stability for Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim’s coalition government.】

item.title: 据说 Yes 银行 50 亿美元的入股将吸引来自中东和日本的贷款人
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿布扎比第一银行（First Abu Dhabi Bank PJSC）是印度 Yes Bank Ltd. 大约 50 亿美元股份的潜在收购者之一。【原文：First Abu Dhabi Bank PJSC is among potential suitors for a roughly $5 billion stake in India’s Yes Bank Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。交易员们对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的证词进行了剖析，大科技公司放弃了 OpenAI 的角色，民主党的分裂使大选前景扑朔迷离。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Traders dissect Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s testimony, Big Tech relinquishes OpenAI roles and divided Democrats keep the election outlook murky. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 美国商业地产崩盘将加深其他地区的痛苦
item.description: 在商业地产崩盘继续肆虐市场之际，困境投资者看到了一代人中购买陷入困境的美国房地产资产的最佳机会之一。【原文：Distressed investors see one of the best opportunities in a generation to buy troubled US real estate assets as the commercial property crash continues to roil the market.】

item.title: 壳牌和主要能源公司同意投资 Adnoc 液化天然气工厂
item.description: 四家国际公司正式同意投资阿布扎比国家石油公司的下一个液化天然气出口项目。【原文：Four international companies formally agreed to invest in Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s next liquefied natural gas export project.】

item.title: 33 英尺巨浪袭击南非海岸，货船紧急撤离
item.description: 周三，暴风雨连续第四天袭击南非海岸线，扰乱了航运业务，巨大的海浪迫使一艘货轮撤离。【原文：Storms pounded South Africa’s coastline for a fourth day on Wednesday, disrupting shipping operations, with massive swells forcing the evacuation of a cargo ship.】

item.title: 香港审计监管机构称信中对普华永道的指控不成立
item.description: 香港审计监管机构表示，对于四月份在社交媒体上流传的一封匿名举报信中对普华永道会计师事务所提出的一些指控，该机构没有发现任何支持证据。【原文：Hong Kong’s audit regulator said it found no supporting evidence for some of the allegations made against PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP in an anonymous whistleblower letter that circulated on social media in April.】

item.title: 房东 Peach 考虑在债券到期前筹集现金的方案
item.description: 业主 Peach Property Group AG 正在权衡各种方案，以筹集新的现金，这家德国住宅物业专家正准备应对明年到期的 3 亿欧元（3.25 亿美元）债券。【原文：Landlord Peach Property Group AG is weighing options to raise fresh cash, as the specialist in German residential properties prepares to address a €300 million ($325 million) bond maturity due next year.】

。【原文：

Declines in population of children under 5 are also hitting urban counties from Chicago to Los Angeles

item.title: 泰国希望避免借贷，数字钱包面临挑战
item.description: 泰国政府表示，它或许可以避免借贷，为向公民发放 "数字钱包 "现金提供资金。【原文：The Thai government says it may be able to avoid borrowing to fund its “digital wallet” cash handout to citizens, which has been delayed by controversy over its funding plans.】

item.title: 新兴市场增长吸引投资者，垃圾债券大行其道
item.description: 随着投资者对新兴市场国家的经济前景越来越有信心，再加上一些有利于市场的政策调整，新兴市场国家发行的高收益债券又开始反弹。【原文：A rally in high-yield debt issued by emerging-market countries is back on as investors grow more confident about their economic outlook, backed by some market-friendly policy corrections.】
